entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
